sentences.english: I went there with my mother and two aunts.
sentences.chinese: 我是和我媽還有二姨舅媽一起去的。

sentences.english: Unexpectedly I caught sight of my aunt in the first ward in the in-patient department.
sentences.chinese: 我竟然在住院部的第一個房間就看見了舅媽。

sentences.english: My aunt was surprised and hoped it was not some Freemason affair.
sentences.chinese: 舅媽有些驚訝，她希望不會又是共濟會的什麼破事。
舅媽帕特麗夏是他的妻子。

sentences.english: When I left the kitchen he was about to recite the opening lines of the piece to my aunt.
sentences.chinese: 他準備給舅媽背誦詩起首的幾句，我離開了廚房。

sentences.english: He lost her parents, and follow the uncle aunt.
sentences.chinese: 自幼失去雙親的她，跟着舅舅舅媽相依爲命。

sentences.english: On Saturday evenings when my aunt went marketing I had to go to carry some of the parcels.
sentences.chinese: 每週六晚舅媽去趕集，我總要陪着提包。

sentences.english: Aunt Selma and Uncle Murray paced.
sentences.chinese: 塞爾瑪舅媽和默裏舅舅跟在後頭。

sentences.english: My uncle and my aunt have three children. They are my cousins.
sentences.chinese: 我的舅舅和舅媽有三個孩子，他們是我的表兄妹。

sentences.english: Aunt Sally kissed her lightly on the cheek and squeezed Fannie gently.
sentences.chinese: 薩莉舅媽輕輕地吻了她的臉頰，溫柔地掐了一下她。

sentences.english: Tell Grandma and Grandpa and my brothers I love them.
sentences.chinese: 告訴祖父祖母和舅舅舅媽，我也愛他們。

sentences.english: It said that my aunt was seriously ill and she was staying in the hospital.
sentences.chinese: 電報上說，舅媽病重，住在蕪湖醫院。

definition: the rice is cooked/what's done is done/it's too late to change anything now (idiom)
pinyin: sheng1 mi3 zhu3 cheng2 shu2 fan4

definition: to make fun of/to seek diversion
lit. to work like an ox, to work like a horse; fig. to work extremely hard
mama-san, middle-aged woman who runs a brothel, bar etc (loanword from Japanese)/madam
adopted son (traditional adoption, i.e. without legal ramifications)
what remains unseen is deemed to be clean/what the eye doesn't see, the heart doesn't grieve over (idiom)
variant of 定親|定亲[ding4 qin1]
adopted daughter (traditional adoption, i.e. without legal ramifications)
variant of 慪氣|怄气[ou4 qi4]
